name: Primal Fear
description:
Text Adventure Horror Game

You wake up in a dark room that is located in an underground system, and you are not alone. Find out how to survive and see the light of another day.

Map

If you get stuck, look at the map provided here.

Sounds are from freesound.org, soundbible.com and youtube. Contact me if you have any questions about misuse, and I will change them.
